fields.name: problemsList
fields.label: if you have problems with pain/aches,stiffness,weakness,or functional problems,describe this/these below. (List the symptoms in descending order with the most troublesome first)

fields.name: problem
fields.label: Have you been diagnosed with this problems?

fields.name: physicalTrauma
fields.label: Did the problem start after a physical trauma?

fields.name: mentalTrauma
fields.label: Did the problem start after a mental trauma?

fields.name: problemOccurs
fields.label: How often do you experince the problem?

fields.label: When do you experience the problem?

fields.name: otherProblems
fields.placeholder: Other? For example in rotaions, side bends, wings strains, working with the arms above the head

fields.name: rateScale
fields.label: How intense is the experience of the problem on average no a 0-10 scale
